author: brett
msg: [MSUREFIRE-148] replace file.toURL() with one that properly encodes the URL.

author: mjc
msg: The Expect header XSS got a CVE name as it was proved you can influence the
header if a user visits a site holding a malicious flash file.
IMO this is a flash flaw, but mark as security for future reference, although
only for 1.3.  2.0 and 2.2 both need to timeout before any XSS happens

msg: Added NPE checking for test case. Still failing though.
